summary: Unable to compress over the same file

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Specify the same filepath for input and output java -jar compiler.jar --js test.js --js_output_file test.js What is the expected output? What do you see instead? test.js should be compressed but the result is an empty file. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? compiler-20120917 on windows7 64bit
We could check if the input and output are the same file and fail gracefully.
This issue was closed by revision r2358.
